Package ru.geekbrains.hexcore

Class Battlefield

java.lang.Object
ru.geekbrains.hexcore.Battlefield
public class Battlefield extends Object
Singleton paradigm class containing tiles Map and their processing

      Parameters:
      hex - coordinate
      Returns:

    • setDimensions

      public static void setDimensions(int top, int bottom, int left, int right)
      Set map size. Only rectangular maps are supported
      Parameters:
      top - top row number
      bottom - bottom row number
      left - left column number
      right - right column number
